info.name: JIRA Large Card
info.description: This allows the user to hover over a card and be able to see the whole card description without having to click on the card to see additional info
info.additionalInfo:
JIRA v1001.0.0

This is a chrome style for JIRA. I cannot confirm that the styles will behave in other browsers.

Please feel free to donate. It helps me to continue making styles and inovate
Donate by clicking on my name Jessica Gardner under the theme name
